rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall leading to the central courtyard. Designed for Vastu compliance.
Adjacent to the entrance hall and overlooking the courtyard.
Open concept design adjoining the living room, with views of the courtyard.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen equipped with energy-efficient appliances and natural light from windows on the east side for optimum morning exposure.
Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom ensuring privacy and tranquility. Located in the south-west quadrant as per Vastu principles.
Child/secondary bedroom designed for relaxation, adjacent to a shared bathroom.
Additional bedroom ensuring ample space and comfort.
Study/office room designed for quiet work or study, incorporating eco-friendly lighting and ventilation.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned on the north side for auspicious energy flow.
Large windows to allow ample morning light and improve ventilation.
Balcony-style openings in the living area with Vastu-compliant placement for energy balance.
Central courtyard acting as a passive ventilation system, promoting natural air circulation.

additional_features.description: Use of sustainable building materials such as recycled concrete, bamboo flooring, and eco-friendly paints.
Incorporation of solar panels on the roof and energy-saving lighting fixtures to reduce carbon footprint.
Rainwater harvesting system integrated with garden irrigation and greywater recycling for sustainability.

vastu_notes.note: North-facing entrance ensures positive energy flow, as per Vastu guidelines.
Rooms are arranged in a balanced manner around the central courtyard to maintain harmony and promote natural air circulation.
The master bedroom is placed on the south-west side for stability and grounding according to Vastu principles.

plot_details.description: Sufficient space allows for an open layout with designated zones for living, sleeping, and communal activities while respecting local building norms.

design_principles.details: All design elements focus on sustainability including energy efficiency, water conservation, and use of natural materials.
The layout and positioning of rooms adhere to Vastu Shastra principles for optimal health and prosperity.
